verbose_text: Furthermore, in the MRL-lpr mouse model of arthritis, treatment with an MCP-1 antagonist, MCP-1 (9-76), prior to disease onset greatly reduced OA progression whereas native MCP-1 enhanced the onset and aggravated joint inflammation [XREF_BIBR].
evidence: MCP-1 antagonist, MCP-1 (9-76), prior to disease onset greatly reduced OA
